## FormStateSelector interface

Represents a selector for a slice of form and state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormStateSelector<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object, TReturnValue, TFormSlice extends string, TStateSlice extends keyof TInputState> extends ReactiveSelector<TFormSlice, TStateSlice> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ReactiveSelector](./dynamic-forms.reactiveselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;TFormSlice, TStateSlice&gt;
